termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.welcome: Wellcome to Appreviewer! Please take time to read our Terms of Use.
termsOfUse.accessing: By accessing and using this Website or any of the content and services provided herein, you agree to be legally bound by these Terms of Use, as well as all applicable terms, policies and operating procedures that may from time to time be published on this Website and the websites of our Gartner Affiliates and Participating Vendors, which are incorporated herein by this reference.
termsOfUse.agree: By accessing and using the website and services, you attest that you have read, understood and agree to be legally bound by the foregoing terms of use.

usage.title: Use of Website

usage.individuals: Those individuals who access the Website and use the Services.
